comment.author: 70100294@N04
comment._content:
Hi, I just use theese pictures to make a screensaver for personal use. But I must say that I think it´s fantastic that you have saved theese pictures for the future.
You do a great job and I hope you will collect more photos from the past when our´s parents and grandfathers fighted for our freedom.
Lars Sigvard Jacobsson. member of American´s NAVY.
Email: solnakisen@live.com
